name: Newton's Nightmare
description:
Newton's Nightmare

Made in a week for Physics Jam (8 Bits to Infinity) for which the theme was Switch. Made in Unity 2020.2.1f1.

As Appleboy, defy Newton's laws of gravity while he attacks you with spiky caterpillars

Controls

Keyboard
- Move: AD / QD / Arrow keys
- Attack: Space / Ctrl

Gamepad
- Move: Left-stick / D-pad
- Attack: X / A (XBox layout)

Credits

Programming & Management by lilou_cormic (purplecable.ca)
